Reviews.AuthorLocation: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
Reviews.Title: “Ocean City's little gem :)”
Reviews.Author: bode72
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Sea Cove about six or seven times and each time it has been wonderful. The rooms are very clean and as nice as the Hampton Inn at half the price. The people at the front desk are great and it's a block from the beach. I can't wait to go back:) Thanks Sea Cove

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised”
Reviews.Author: Chris R
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a double above the hotel office on a Friday night. Read mixed reviews prior to booking. We were pleasantly surprised to see a renovated room with faux wood floor, ceramic tile in the bathroom, new furniture and comfortable beds. The layout reminded me of an updated Motel 6 with a recessed open closet, small sink, and picture frames secured to the wall. The place was nicely cleaned and had plenty of soap and towels for our use. The AC unit was relatively new and had a remote. It hummed quietly through the night (not awakening us with the fan turning off and on as in some other places). The large TV was not a flat screen, but worked well. Some cable stations were blocked, but we weren't there to watch. The location was excellent and near the beach. The fridge was cold when we got there, and we didn’t try the microwave. For the cost compared to other hotels in the area and our one and only experience, we would recommend it. The hotel had everything we could ask for with the price: clean, quiet, comfortable and close to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome experience!!!!”
Reviews.Author: kleidim
Reviews.Content: Just got back from ocean city Maryland and stayed at the sea cove. The room was great, the service was great and the hostess was very friendly. Great view from the balcony and the boardwalk is very close! 5 stars for the price..

Reviews.Title: “We love this place!”
Reviews.Author: Barbara H
Reviews.Content: My family and I have stayed at Sea Cove Motel for abt 5 yrs for our vacations in OC MD. Awesome location, price is right and room is clean. Peter and all hotel staff couldn't be more accommodating if any issue does come up. For 2012 we have even booked 2nd vac in August and we are excited to return.

Reviews.Title: “Dont listen to the other reviews”
Reviews.Author: ajh1527
Reviews.Content: Despite the bad reviews this place was just what we were looking for. Good price, close to the beach, and clean. No big flaws in anything here!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: Erifili M
Reviews.Content: Great location! Great value! Great stay! My room was clean and spacious. The hotel staff were friendly and helpful. I loved my stay here and would love to come back as soon as possible. 5.0

Reviews.Title: “Iove it and will be back”
Reviews.Author: Keith T
Reviews.Content: I've been staying at SeaCove for the past of 5 years on labor day weekend and i've never had any problems whats so ever. All of the staff at Sea cove are great and kind.Keep up the great service thankyou,,

Reviews.Title: “Great location and value”
Reviews.Author: Ishbinshawn
Reviews.Content: My family received last minute accommodations and in spite of the reviews we read we were extremely pleased. Not only was the staff helpful the location and price, especially during a holiday was exceptional. We were a very short walk from the beach. Parking was adequate and we had no issues. The room was cozy and clean. We WILL return.

Reviews.Title: “Expensive and dirty”
Reviews.Author: melinda1984
Reviews.Content: I will never stay at the sea cove motel again, when me and my family got in our room it stunk so bad like mildew and wasn't very clean, we found food in the fridge in a shopping bag. GROSS! Me and my two sons fell asleep and I woke up by my boyfriend lifting up the matress to look for cockroaches since he found one on the wall and then I was heated and went to the front desk and told the guy I want a refund or a better room that doesn't stink or have bugs so he showed us like 3 rooms until we we're happy with one. I didn't like the idea where I had to look out the door and wait for the house keeper for new towels so we could get a shower. The only think I can say anything nice about this place is the location...it's so closed to the beach and boardwalk. I think they need to knocked it down or just closed it. I'm really upset how much money I spent on my stay...it was not worth it at all. Me and my man did find a hotel we liked for next time we visit ocean city.

Reviews.Title: “Roaches and Mold”
Reviews.Author: lilloo34
Reviews.Content: Brought my family down to Ocean City on a little 4 day vacation. Found the Sea cove online and looked really nice. Wish i seen the reviews first. We got luck and got checked in at around 11am on a friday, when we first walked into the room my girlfriend said it smelled a little funny like mold, i said it is a hotel room they usually do smell funny. Later on just sitting around enjoying a drink after my family was asleep i noticed something crawling up the wall, got a closer look and it was a cock roach. After seeing this i went all through the room with a flash light looking for more. found some mold and someones food balled up in the refridge, also the smoke detector was ripped off the wall with wires hanging out. I got mad woke up my girlfriend said pack up we are not staying here with our 2 little boys one 1yrs old and the other 4yrs old. So i went to the offoce to tell someone about what i saw and when i did he smiled and laughed like i was messing around, and believe me i wasnt. I told him he better do something right now or i wanted my money back one way or another. So he gave me keys to another room and i went and looked at it and it smelled worse. I gave the keys to my girlfriend and said you better go over there cause by this point i was fuming. He showed her 3 more rooms before finally the last room smelled good like it had just been cleaned, maybe! After packing and carrying things to the new room i told the guy one more thing i find and we are out of here and i want our money back in full, he said ok. After this our room was ok but found mold in the bathroom on the ceiling about the tub. The whole stay there no one came in to clean, we had to put our garbage out on the the walk way for it to be taken and go around and find someone to ask for towels. They say you get what you pay for, but this was way over priced for a mold and cock roach infested, unsafe dump.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Motel”
Reviews.Author: Patricia V
Reviews.Content: The Sea Cover Motel was a pleasant surprise. The rooms were clean, bright and very welcoming.....the people at the front desk were very friendly and helpful and reasonable for my budget....just a hop, skip and a jump to the beach and in walking distance to many restaurants and entertainment places.....love it! will return for sure. The Motel was very quiet and respectable....can't complain about anything.....had a very good time.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Affordable!”
Reviews.Author: ilmaria109
Reviews.Content: We came to Ocean City for a weekend away with the kids, and found this place by word of mouth. It was very clean, and affordable for our budget and were very pleased with the service! We were only a few steps from the beach and only 2 blocks from the Jolly Rogers water park, making it very convenient. Thank you to management! It was a great weekend. Would recommend to family's looking for clean and affordable accomodations right next to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “My worst nightmare!!!”
Reviews.Author: Dabesti
Reviews.Content: Checked in everything went good got the keys went to room walked in had a fishy smell, turned on a/c went out came back and a/c was leaking on to the blanket so had to use my cell phone since the motel didnt have a house phone in there to see if we can get another blanket bought up instead we had to go down to front desk and receive blanket. T.V. was the smallest t.v. i ever seen. The money i paid was not worth it, i paid exactly 219.91 and i should of paid 50 at the most. Housekeeper knocked on the door the next morning at 10:20 tellin us to check out and we said at 11 ( like normal check out time is) then the chinese lady comes back at 10:45 telling us we need to check out. This is the worst place I've ever stayed at. I will not RECCOMMENEND this to anybody. This motel should be knocked down and rebuilt and hire people who speak ENGLISH!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “don't even think about coming here!!”
Reviews.Author: tur0
Reviews.Content: i don't know if its the owner or just the morning manager but he tried to rob me for my money. i asked if there were more parking spots and he said yes so he charged me for an extra parking pass. then i told them i only had one car and he lied and said he saw my friend in the other car and that was a huge lie because my friend didn't have a car nor a drivers licence . then once i said i was going to call the police he gave me my money back and insulted us while we were on our way out. so not only is this place expensive but its also crappy and they try really hard to find a way to rob u for your money. so don't come here or you'll regret it. they also go to your room around 10:00 to tell you you have to leave at 11:00

Reviews.Title: “HATED IT!”
Reviews.Author: kappydoodle
Reviews.Content: We made the mistake of booking online. Got there, found food in the freezer, not frozen due to cheap fridge and neglect, drug residue, sticky spilled alchohol, full trash cans, MOLDY curtains, sticky floors, curbside matresses (Holiday Inn express's) used sheets. Do you need to hear anymore?????? Left the room and the manager would'nd give a refund. Really? Take better care of your rooms and your customers Sea Cove!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Cockroach and Mold”
Reviews.Author: mmm2428dp
Reviews.Content: This was horrible. Smelled like mushrooms which has to be mold somewhere. Dirty boxers were found under the sink in thte bathroom and socks were under the bed. A huge thousand legger was found by the air conditioner. A plastic shopping bag was wrapped over the smoke detector. The vent in the bathroom was missing the cover and exposed about and half inch of pure dust and scum. One out of 6 lights worked, the rest were burnt out. My fellow tenants and I were going to tough all this out and stay the weekend untill I found a COCKROACH crawling beside me in the bed. We lifted up the matress to reveal more roaches. The matress said Mariot on it which means it was used and extra soiled. We decided to confront the manager. We brought the COCKROACH down to him and he was amused by it and decided to begin playing with it like a pet. He then came up with bug spray and suggested he spray the beds and the floors. I told him to get out and refund me my money. He did not like that and we argued for a while. He went back down to his office. I decided to walk back down to the office where I found a forgien boy sitting behind the desk, I asked him where the manager was and he said he went home for the night, this was 2 minutes after he was in my room. I said I was going to call the police and then suddenly the manager appears from a back closet where he was hiding. I demanded a refund. I stayed 1 night at this point and paid for 3 at 200 each night which is 600 total. He finally gave me 200 as a refund and told me to get out. He also told me that I brought to COCKROACH from home so I could get a free nights stay. This place is a joke and I am currently working with the health department to get it closed down.

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here”
Reviews.Author: lizsp33
Reviews.Content: A friend of mine booked this hotel so I had no idea what I was in for. It's in a good location, but that's about all that can be said for it. There isn't any curb appeal, and the rooms inside are even worse. There is sand everywhere - in the beds, on the floors, you can't escape it. We were walking around with our shoes on because it was so uncomfortable after a while. As someone else mentioned, there is no cleaning service while you stay there, and there doesn't seem to be much cleaning service done in between stays either. The decor is very old. There is a box unit for the AC that is very loud, but it did keep the room cold. The bathroom is small and dated. A few of the lights burned out in the room. There is no way to get the room dark at night because there is a window above the door with no curtain and there are bright lights in the halls. Also the curtain itself didn't close all the way either. My single biggest complaint would have to be that there are no dead bolts on the door. I was really uncomfortable with this lack of security. We didn't have any trouble getting more towels from the front desk, but the owner was not there so maybe that is why. The towels were so small and threadbare that you needed two per person. There were a lot of teenagers staying here for senior week when I was here so they were hanging out in the halls a lot, but thankfully not too noisy at night. This is definitely not a good place to come with the family or if you really want to relax and enjoy yourself since there is no comfort to be found at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “A pleasant surprise in an emergency!”
Reviews.Author: 1Janine1
Reviews.Content: We had to leave our home for the week (plumbing repair) and travel with two cats. I found the listing for Sea Cove under pet-friendly hotels and decided I had no time to waste making a reservation at less than two weeks notice. I have a 7 year old son who had never been to the beach before, as well. I called and had a reservation in no time, check in was a breeze, and our room was excellent. I lived in town for a while a few years back and had an apartment that was very comparable. The staff was extremely helpful every time we needed something. The management was terrific and very nice. If you are expecting wall-to-wall carpeting and fine decor at the beach, you are sadly mistaken...that's why you pay so much up the street!!! Frankly, a clean room, a clean bed, and a shower are all you need at the beach. How long are you honestly in the room on vacation? I'd rather have shopping money:D Great place on the cheap!!!

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for...in this case, bugs.”
Reviews.Author: Amy_G_2805
Reviews.Content: Our first impression was that the staff was very nice and though the hotel did not have nice "curb appeal" I knew that I was going to get a less than 3 star experience because I paid $179 per night. When we walked in the room, the kids immediately noted that it smelled like fungus or wet mushrooms. We hung up a car freshener in the hopes to mask the smell. We spent the day at the beach (was only 1 block away - the only plus about the trip). After returning we settled into bed. After being startled awake by the fire engine passing by at 3:45 AM, I checked on the kids. I saw a bug crawling near my son's head, so I caught it. I didn't know what it was, so I got on the internet and looked at some pictures. It looked like a bed bug, so I pulled back the sheets and found MORE in the places that the health department website said to look. I took the ones that I caught down to the front desk, and the clerk told me I'd have to wait until the owner got in at 9:15am. I waited until he got there, and showed him what I had found. He accused me of bringing them in and trying to get a free night's stay. He also said his hotel had never had bugs before. This of course, did not make me happy. He offered to have his staff clean the room next door and let us move, but we had to immediately move everything out of that room so he could send an exterminator in. We moved everything out and waited for an hour for the cleaning crew to finish. As soon as we moved out, a man came in with large trash bags and a large white bottle with a hose and sprayer attached. He shut the curtains and locked the door, so I'm assuming he was attempting to kill the bugs. The room we moved into had obviously been scrubbed with bleach, which made me feel a little better, but not good enough to stay. I chalked it up as a loss and we left Ocean City early. You get what you pay for, but I certainly didn't expect to pay for bed bugs

Reviews.Title: “Health Code Violation”
Reviews.Author: serinalisa
Reviews.Content: Okay so there are two buildings - one attached to the motel office and one on the other side. The one on the other side is okay, I would stay there. The one room we stayed in however... - blood splatter on the bathroom wall (wtf) - shower with NO showerhead.. so you got a continuous spray - moldy smell - holes in walls - smoke detector ripped from wall - broken glass on floor - cleaning people did not come once during 3 day stay, you have to go to the office and beg for towels - speaking of the office, the manager told me it would be $140 a night, when i check in, he says 160. I say "you told me on the phone 140." he says ''okay, okay 140.". - non working microwave - when these issues are brought up to the office manager (only two people work there) he denies everything and says too bad, ive already paid. do not stay here. you will get a staph infection if you dont die from an unwarrented fire first.

Reviews.Title: “Great room, great location, good price!”
Reviews.Author: Hotndivine
Reviews.Content: I was a little scared about this motel after I booked a room for the weekend and then read reviews, however I was pleasantly surprised and couldn't wait to write a review for others. For starters this was a great location, it's at the beginning of the boardwalk off of 28th street. We felt very part of the action and felt it was a very good place to be. You walk over one block and your at the beach! The hotel room was very clean but very basic, so if your a floofy floofy "Paris Hilton" type of person you will want to stay elsewhere. There is a 24 hr 7-11 right across the street and many others restaurants within walking distance. There were young adults who were there to party, but I brought ear plugs and slept fine. The beds were comfortable and the shower was hot and fantastic. The room also had a new A/C unit which worked too great, we had to turn it off it got too cold. We paid $130 for a 2 double bed room that came with a microwave and mini fridge. There were no bugs, the room was cleaned for us, great parking, we had NO problems! This was our first trip to Ocean City and the Sea Cove Motel help to make it a very memorable experience! I would go back and stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Great place, Great location, Great room!”
Reviews.Author: fgfgfgfg
Reviews.Content: I just stayed here for 3 days and 2 nights for Senior Week. I read all the reviews before hand, and I was a little concerned since they were all so negative. I have to say though, the Sea Cove is a nice place! There were no "roaches" and the Owner was very nice. I stayed on the third floor, and everyday the stairs and everything was cleaned. For the room---def not 5 star hotel, but it was nice! Great for teenagers and young couples! The room was clean, great A/C unit, and it was even furnished with 3 chairs to put on the porch. Overrall, Sea Cove is GREAT motel and I highly recommend it to anyone interested in a nice, comfy, clean, great location Motel!

Reviews.Title: “God Awful”
Reviews.Author: softballem
Reviews.Content: I decided it would be a nice little get away last minute for my girlfriends birthday. Little did i know what i was getting myself into. The "help desk" well lets just say wasnt that. worst service/manager/owner ever. I wanted to check into my hotel room and found a note on the door with his cell phone number saying for emergencies. when he finally got there after a 2 hour wait we checked in to find the worst hotel i have ever seen. tile floor that was covered in sand roaches throughout the dresser drawers, and the smell was awful. The one bed was broken luckily we only needed one, and thats the extent of the time we were in the room. When i went to checkout the next day we had scheduled a time to go jet skiing and we were late and had to reschedule due to the front desk again had the sign on the door saying for emergencies only. I called it.. very rude on the phone but what did i expect he was rude when we checked in too. he tells me to wait for him or i will get charged for another night. so i waited and it was an hour and half wait for him, and i had to cancel and didnt get to go jet skiing for that was all my girlfriend wanted to do for her birthday. so thanks to this hotel it ruined my nice planned weekend for my girlfriends birthday. it may be cheap but spend a few more bucks and go somewhere else at least a place that treats you with respect.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting roach infested dump!!”
Reviews.Author: lp255
Reviews.Content: My wife, kids and I planned to stayed at the Sea Cove Motel for 2 night. When we checked in the place was disgusting, filthy dirty. The shower was full of pubic hair and it looked like vomit between the shower and toilet. We asked the man at the desk to have someone clean it and he told me that the room was already cleaned and the maid would not be in until the morning. I requested another room but was told there were none available. I returned to the room only to find my wife freaking out because there were roaches in the dresser drawers. I returned to the front desk and asked for the manager. The man told me he was the manager. I asked him to refund my money so I could leave and get another room somewhere else because of the bugs and filth. He began to laugh and say I was lying because the room was cleaned prior to us checking in and they don't have roaches. I insisted that he comes to the room to see for himself, which he refused. I again demanded my money back. The manager again refused and told me I am free to leave but I will be charged for 3 days as this is the minimum stay he says. I was never informed of a 3 night minimum stay. I told him I would call the police if he did not return my money. He told me he was going to call the police if I don't leave his office. I told him that I will see him in court and sue him for the money back and he told me to try it that he will sue me back and win just like he has with all the other people that try to get refunds or not pay. He then told me to get out and get my family out of his motel or he will physically remove us from the property. I did leave with my wife and stayed at the spinnaker hotel. I returned home and cancelled my credit card. If anyone is smart they will stay far, far away from this place.

Reviews.Title: “Not Worth It At Any Price”
Reviews.Author: JenniferMaryland
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this motel for two nights while attending a conference. I found a very good price on the internet for a mid-week stay and knew in advance this would be a real economy class motel. Since I knew I would be attending the conference throughout the day I was not concerned with the amenities, or lack there of. The first room I was given had been cleaned, so after lugging my suitcase up a narrow flight of stairs, no elevators, I had to drag it back down to get another room. Although the second room had been made up it was anything but clean. When I made the reservastion I requested a non-smoking room. However it was clear from the cigarette burn marks on all the furniture and the bathroom sink that my request was ignored. Every time I entered my room the smell of smoke, stale beer and mildew was over powering. The floors were dirty, the dresser drawers filthy, and behind and under the dressers and bed disgusting. The sink did not drain until I pulled cigarette butts and a bottle cap out of it. The first night I was there I realized most of the lightbulbs in the room were burned out, when I went to the desk at 9 pm to complain the door was locked and a sign gave an emergancy number. When I went back in the morning the front desk gave me several 40 watt bulbs to put in myself. I have never been so glad to leave a motel in my life. It was absolutely horrid.

Reviews.Title: “Roach Motel!”
Reviews.Author: MrandMrsBOC
Reviews.Content: I don't normally write reviews, but my stay at the Sea Cove was so AWFUL I feel the need to alert other travelers who might be looking for a last minute vacation deal. IT WAS NOT WORTH IT! The room was DISGUSTING. Stains on sheets, pillowcases, and the threadbare rugs. The room was furnished with 2 beds and plastic lawn chairs as their "plush indoor furnishings." Had to kill about 4 or 5 roaches, dirty towels, sink, toilet, and bath - GROSS. AC did not work, lights were dim, and there was a hole in the curtains letting anyone see right in. Confronted management- RUDE and UNHELPFUL...tried to blame us for the condition of the room 20 minutes after we checked in! Was supposed to spend a week at this hotel- it was so bad we checked out after ONE NIGHT. My wife and I thought we could put up with it...but it was too bad to stay there. Maid never came following morning, notified office of need for clean towels...AGAIN rude and unhelpful. That's when we decided to check out. The man at the front desk threatened us and refused to refund our money for our week's stay, and then began personally attacking my wife to me. A very low breed kind of individual. Other guests were also in office complaining, and at least two other couples were checking out. This is a "rent by the hour" type of place or at least should be...DEFINATELY not for couples, or families looking for a nice vacation! They had a college kid special posted- Let me tell you, I would not want my son or daughter in this kind of environment. It was close to everything, cheap, and available...HOWEVER, you could not PAY ME TO STAY THERE AGAIN. Please, do yourself a favor and stay ANYWHERE else in OCMD. You'll be saving yourself a lot of trouble and money in the long run!

HotelInfo.Name: Sea Cove Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 2701 N Baltimore Ave., Ocean City, MD 21842
